kannada_original: ನಗೆಯಡುಗೆ ಒಲೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಇದೆ ತಾಪ, ಮುನಿಸು ಹೊಗೆ;
english_transliteration: Nageyaḍuge oleyalli ide tāpa, munisu hoge;
english_translation: In the cooking of laughter, there is heat, and anger is smoke;
sweetness and bitterness are very natural in family life.

kannada_original: ಸಿಹಿ ಸವಿದು ಕಹಿ ಇನಿತು ಬೇಡವೆಂದರೆ ಹೇಗೆ ?
english_transliteration: Sihi savidu kahi initu bēḍavendare hēge ?
english_translation: How can one say they want the sweet but not a little of the bitter?
